about_the_game:
Welcome to “A Diary of an International Student,” a brand-new simulation and Pachinko roguelite game. Here, you will experience the life of studying abroad and face endless challenges and fun!
Features:
✅ 30+ Orbs
🔥 30+ Moods
🎲 60+ Random Events
❓ 50+ Relics
Life Simulation:
* Daily Activities: Attend classes, work part-time, hang out at the bar, socialise... every day brings something new to discover! Balance your activities to achieve better results in your life.
Battle System:
* Pachinko: Engage in fixed weekly pinball battles to fend off various monsters you might encounter while studying abroad. Each monster has its own unique characteristics.
Advanced Gameplay:
* Mood System: Maintaining a good mood during your study abroad journey is crucial. Different moods will affect the difficulty of battles and life simulations.
More Features:
* Every choice you make in the game will impact your life and battles. The weather will also influence the game.

Welcome to “A Diary of an International Student,” a brand-new simulation and Pachinko roguelite game. Here, you will experience the life of studying abroad and face endless challenges and fun!
Features:

* Daily Activities: Attend classes, work part-time, hang out at the bar, socialise... every day brings something new to discover! Balance your activities to achieve better results in your life.
Battle System:
* Pachinko: Engage in fixed weekly pinball battles to fend off various monsters you might encounter while studying abroad. Each monster has its own unique characteristics.
Advanced Gameplay:
* Mood System: Maintaining a good mood during your study abroad journey is crucial. Different moods will affect the difficulty of battles and life simulations.
More Features:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15+
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 512 MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15+
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The Diary of an International Student, a captivating simulation and Pachinko rogue-lite game. Make decisions, develop skills, collect powerful relics, and maintain mental well-being to face simulated adversaries. Navigate the unique challenges of student life abroad in this strategic adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
